comments: Burns expects you to know your stuff. His quizes are very difficult if you don\'t read the assignments, but if you do and take good notes you will do fine. Go to class, take notes, ask questions and stay on top of the project. He seems scary, but he will help you. If you want a challenge and to learn a lot, take his class!

the problem with this guy is his attitude of "im right". hes just an a**. youll never prove anything cause hes the king of circular arguments. yea he gives you notes for pop quizzes... that cover any and all reading. so think of it like you have a 2-page paper due each class. not a favor at all. and he has a 30 page syllabus to screw you.
